Package Math

package Math
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Matrix4x4
    This is the Matrix4x4 class, it contains the definition of a 4x4 matrix, and associated functions to transform it.
    Quaternion
    Quaternions extends a rotation in three dimensions and operations on them
    Transform
    Transform class provides factory methods for the simple transformations - rotating, scaling, and translation.
    Vector2f
    This is the Vector2f class, 2 element vector that is represented by x y coordinates, this class contains all the necessary functions to work with Vector2f
    Vector3f
    This is the Vector3f class, 3 element vector that is represented by x y z coordinates, this class contains all the necessary functions to work with Vector3f
